author: Alex Michaelides
review: A thrilling psychological drama that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The story of Alicia Berenson, a famous painter who is accused of murdering her husband, unfolds with twists and turns that will surprise you.

author: Michelle Obama
review: An inspiring memoir by the former First Lady, Michelle Obama. The book gives a powerful account of her life, from her childhood in Chicago to her time in the White House.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A beautifully written fantasy novel about a magical competition between two young illusionists. The atmospheric setting and enchanting storytelling make this book a true escape.

author: Tara Westover
review: An extraordinary memoir that recounts the author's journey from growing up in a survivalist family to earning a PhD from Cambridge University. It is both heart-wrenching and inspiring.

author: Delia Owens
review: A beautifully evocative novel set in the marshes of North Carolina. It blends mystery, romance, and nature, telling the story of a girl abandoned by her family and growing up in isolation.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: A classic fantasy novel that introduces readers to the world of Middle-earth. Bilbo Bagginsâ€™ unexpected journey to help a group of dwarves reclaim their home is filled with adventure and rich world-building.
